attributes.action: see a repeat of the peaceful revolution that took place in iceland
attributes.additional_details:
I wish to see a repeat of the events that took place in Iceland during 2008, here in Britain.

- Britain's main financial institutions shall be nationalised, as well as key public services such as the railways and energy
- the resignation of both the prime minister and the government. New elections shall be held excluding those currently in power
- a referendum and new constitution shall be created, swell as a public vote on whether the queen shall maintain her position as head of state
- an independent public investigation will take place into the actions of bankers and corporate leaders, if found guilty they will be prosecuted.
